tag_line: Turning the unimaginable into reality, powered by bits and bytes.
intro_tagline: Building robust backends where logic, performance, and reliability come together to power seamless digital experiences.
subTitle: Behind every smooth app lies backend magic ensuring speed and security.
favorites_quote: No great code is written in a single sitting. It’s built line by line, with patience, persistence, and countless moments of trial and error.
bio_desc: I’m passionate about turning complex challenges into innovative, scalable solutions. As a software engineer, I’ve built high-performing web applications using Python, JavaScript, and other cutting-edge technologies.
